title: Chocolate and Coffee Profiteroles
ingredients: ['For the Pastry Cream', '50g icing sugar', '2 large egg yolks', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '190ml milk', '4 tablespoons extra-strong coffee', '25g unsalted butter', 'For the Choux Pastry', '75ml water', '30g unsalted butter, diced', '45g bread flour, sifted', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', 'For the Chocolate Sauce', '50g good quality dark chocolate (at least 70%)', '1 knob butter', 'water as needed']
